items.text: slower ball, tries to open the face but gets beaten by lack of pace
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: plays a length ball late to point
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: back of a length around off, run down to third man with an open face
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: angles in and beats the flick to rap the pad. Bhuvi belts out an appeal, not given. Huge inside edge
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to extra cover
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Darshan Mandali: "And again India is struggling to take last 3 wickets. Story of Indians since last series. India should allow oppositions top order to bat again."
items.text: backs away and drags a cut to long-off
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: moves across and laps a length ball up to fine leg for a brace
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: leg-side lines, tucked away to backward square
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: nudges a fuller one out to square leg
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: advances down the ground, meet the pitch and goes over extra cover as he carves it away with the turn. Flat six
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, SIX runs

items.text: opens the face and drops it to backward point
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: shovels a length ball back towards Bhuvneshwar who half-stops it
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: back of a length on off, flicked to the left of midwicket
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.preText: Snehil: "Rohit, please bring Jadhav into the attack to clean up the tail."
items.text: short of a length, slower, punched to long-on
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: slower length ball, hangs back and opens the face to steer to third man
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: short ball, no contact on the pull as it goes over
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: short, pulled out to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Kumar to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Harish: "Jadhav will be the right answer to clean up the Bangla tail... Rohit - bring him in."
items.text: length, spinning away towards off, punched to long-on
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: advances to a full toss and doesn't find the middle as he whips it away to deep midwicket. 150 up
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: comes down and flicks but rolls off the pad into the off side
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: leg-side fuller ball, swept to short fine leg
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: straightens on off, backs away and cuts to short third man
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: googly, flicked behind square
items.shortText: Chahal to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.preText: Chaitu : "Is Rohit trying to create a record of dot balls in a 50 over match instead of sweeping the tail? Come on.. please bring Jadhav.. this partnership is not good for us "
items.text: hit on the outer part of the back thigh as he swivels early on the pull
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: simply backs away guides a short of a length delivery to third man
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run
